11.2. [Pseudo-Bede] In Matthaei evangelium expositio.
Exposition | Matthew
Manuscripts:
1. Cologne, Dombibliothek 16, f. 1v-39v. saec. ix-x; Germany. Later attribution (saec. xvi?) to Bede in MS.
2. Fulda, Landesbibliothek Aa 4o 19, f. 1r-56v. saec. ix2; Constance. Attributed to Hrabanus Maurus. (S)
3. Ljubljana, Narodna in univerzitetna knjižnica 18 (Kos 13), f. 21-163. Attributed to Bede. (S)
4. Munich, Bayerische Staatsbibliothek Clm 3741, f. 8v-66. saec. x1/2. O: Reichenau; P: Augsburg. (S)
5. Nürnberg, Germanisches National Museum 3942, f. 1-92. saec. ix2. (S)
6. Wolfenbüttel, Herzog August Bibliothek 4144 (Weissenburg 60), f. 1-77.  saec. ix ex. (S)
